episodes.title: FATHER OF ABUSE VICTIM CONFRONTS WITNESSES
episodes.description:
Join John Viney, former JW of 50+ years and elder of 20+ years on a journey around a JW convention. John is the father of an abuse victim and confronts Jehovah's Witness in attendance at the 'Love Never Fails' Convention 2019 in Cardiff.

He uses their own Watchtower magazine to question child safety within their organisation. 

In May 2019, the Watchtower introduced the idea of 'professed' Jehovah's Witnesses - Witnesses who have abused children but are still allowed in the congregation. 

John Investigates.

COPYRIGHT NOTICE: The songs used in this video are not that of the filmmakers, All copyright belongs to the artists.

John Murphy & David Hughes

18 With A Bullet
